snippet.title: This Japanese Town Replaced Humans With Scarecrows
snippet.description:
In a Japanese town with a dying population, we find hundreds of scarecrows, zero children, and a voice that I hope I never forget...
On the island of Shikoku in South-Western Japan, there is a village that has replaced humans with scarecrows. This is the story of Nagoro Village.

Come hang out on Instagram! http://www.instagram.com/tokyo_one
Let's be Twitter buddies!:  http://www.twitter.com/tokyo_lens

Special Thanks to Victor from Frame of Travel for the Thumbnail Image

For behind the scenes stories, livestreams, and more
https://www.Patreon.com/TokyoLens

*******THE TOKYO LENS PRINTS AND MORE*******
